Siconos Software Home Page

Siconos Help and Documentation.

All documentation files and help are located on Siconos Gforge
The main documents you can find on these pages are listed below.

Available Manuals:

  • Siconos Installation Guide: how to download, install the platform, what are the required libraries ...

  • Getting Started with Siconos: a short tutorial on how to use Siconos and write your own samples in C++ or Python.

In Process:

  • Siconos User Manual: fully detailed description of all the Siconos functionalities (based on Doxygen)

  • Siconos Theory Manual (in progress, not yet available)

Code documentation

  • A detailed Design Description.

  • A basic software Development Methodology.

  • A Short Overview of the Software design.

  • Doxygen Documentation for Kernel, auto-generated documentation for Siconos-Kernel

  • Doxygen Documentation for Numerics, auto-generated documentation for Siconos-Numerics

Miscellaneous

  • An overview of the Siconos European project.

  • Forum.

  • Bug Trackers.

  • Mailing Lists.
